lead_paragraph: The Canadian track and field team will skip the opening ceremony because of the Olympic schedule, as well as concerns about pollution, traffic and training. The Canadian athletes will be training in Singapore when the Olympics open Aug. 8 in Beijing, seven days before track and field events begin. The Australian track and field team is taking a similar approach, staying in Hong Kong.
